thread.title: Sandra
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Sandra

author: Sandra
title: Sandra
text: I have been using College Planning Center for the past four years and I love it! They are always so professional and helpful. It definitely takes the stress out of the whole financial aide process.
